page.title: 12CLUBS
page.content: There are{40 clubs}in Alford and district, there are 11 sporting clubs and 29 none sporting clubs. They range from sporting clubs to dramatic societies and childrens clubs. This year Alford cricket club celebrates its{100th anniversary.}To celebrate there will be a cricket match, Alford against Sparks charity. It will be held on July 21st and there will be some famous people there such as Peter Duncan and Robert Powell. The numbers of members has also increased since{1885.}The ground has also improved and is now almost perfect. The chairman is G. Turner and the president is J. Spence. The club has {35}men members and{11}junior members.The cricket club has a pavillion with changing rooms and showers, they also have a club house.
